author: cms-sw
body:
We do not need flatbuffer patches for python 3.12 where we already have a newer version of flatbuffers 24.3.25. 
- flatbuffers-7422.patch was not applied previously for CMSSW_15_1_X/py312 so it should be safe to drop it for CMSSW_16_0_X/py312
- https://patch-diff.githubusercontent.com/raw/google/flatbuffers/pull/7227.diff : was applied only for gcc13 for older version of flatbuffers but as we are using a newer flatbuffers so we do need itany more
title: [PY312] Dropped flatbuffers patches
